body:
Hey guys, im planning on starting youtube as a hobby and im in need of a decent
recording software which can record minecraft vids etc. etc.

I currently get an average of 90-120 fps on Minecraft (w/o Optifine; Optifine lags my game for some reason)
and im aiming for atleast 60-90 fps ingame when recording videos at 30 fps.

(Laptop Specs as much as i know of)
- Intel CORE i3 processor
- AMD Radeon 2G Graphics Card
- 500 GB Internal Harddrive

Requirements:
- it must be FREE!
- atleast can record in 30 fps w/ no ingame lag (60-90 fps at the least ingame)
- no watermarks and advertisement (like bandicam)
- add some settings you use that would help me in setting up the recording software before recording

(a couple ppl told me Camtasia Studios 8 is free and is decent for those who are starting youtube or
doing it as a hobby)

replies.body:
You don't need to bother trying to get a cracked version of Cam Studio 8.

Download the free trial off their website, which has all the features like the full version, then keep extending the trial at the end of the 30 days.

Simple and safe.
replies.body_tagged:
You don't need to bother trying to get a cracked version of Cam Studio 8.

Download the free trial off their website, which has all the features like the full version, then keep extending the trial at the end of the 30 days.

Simple and safe.
